title: Any fun rune combinations you've found?
body:
I'll also take advice. I just feel kinda confused when I look at these things. and like... is the inspiration tree even worth investing in? I just like the slow thing, but everything else seems kinda meh.
which one is better the comet or the ghost kitty?
I don't have a lot of time to mess with these things, so I'm interested in hearing what everyone else likes.
